analyticalDashboards.description: The Products dashboard provides a comprehensive view of metrics like net sales and customer engagement, reflecting business performance. It offers insights into revenue trends, profitability by category, and product performance, crucial for strategic decision-making and enhancing growth opportunities.
analyticalDashboards.title: 4. Products

metrics.description: Measures the total number of unique customers with orders, providing insights into active engagement and business performance.
metrics.title: Active Customers

metrics.description: ARPU measures the average revenue generated per active customer, providing insights into customer value and business performance.
metrics.title: ARPU

metrics.description: Measures the average cost per unit of products, aiding in pricing strategy and enhancing profitability analysis.
metrics.title: Average Price of Products

metrics.description: Measures the average cost per product, key for optimizing pricing strategies and enhancing profit margins.
metrics.title: Average Product Cost

metrics.description: Measures the average cost per unit of products sold, aiding in pricing strategy and profitability assessments.
metrics.title: Average Product List Price

metrics.description: Measures the net cost of goods sold by factoring in order costs and returns, essential for pricing and profitability insights.
metrics.title: COGS

metrics.description: Calculates total cost of goods sold for processed orders, aiding in pricing strategies and profit analysis.
metrics.title: COGS [Orders]

metrics.description: Measures total return costs by multiplying unit costs with quantities, providing insights for profitability and inventory management.
metrics.title: COGS [Returns]

metrics.description: Measures the number of active customers with successfully processed orders, highlighting sales effectiveness and customer satisfaction.
metrics.title: Customers w/ Processed Orders

metrics.description: Measures the net difference between processed and canceled orders, providing insight into delivery efficiency.
metrics.title: Delivered

metrics.description: Measures profitability by calculating the difference between net sales and cost of goods sold, indicating financial health.
metrics.title: Gross Profit

metrics.description: Measures profitability as a percentage, revealing how efficiently a company converts sales into profit.
metrics.title: Gross Profit Margin

metrics.description: Measures the total value of discounts given, providing insight into revenue impact and pricing strategies.
metrics.title: Total Discounts N

metrics.description: Measures the total negative returns, highlighting losses and helping assess investment performance.
metrics.title: Total Returns N

metrics.description: Measures total processed orders, offering key insights into sales performance and customer engagement trends.
metrics.title: Net Orders

metrics.description: Measures the revenue from sales after accounting for discounts and returns, providing insights into true sales performance.
metrics.title: Net Sales

metrics.description: Measures the target revenue by increasing last period's net sales by 10%, guiding sales performance towards growth.
metrics.title: Net Sales Goal

metrics.description: Tracks new customers by counting those who made their first purchase, highlighting growth in customer acquisition.
metrics.title: New Customers

metrics.description: Tracks the number of new customers acquired each month, highlighting growth opportunities and customer acquisition effectiveness.
metrics.title: New Customers Monthly

content.maql: SELECT {metric/net_sales} / (SELECT {metric/net_sales} BY ALL OTHER WITHOUT PF)

metrics.description: Measures the proportion of net sales to total sales, revealing the effectiveness of revenue generation strategies.
metrics.title: % of Net Sales

metrics.description: Measures total orders placed, providing insight into sales volume and customer engagement over time.
metrics.title: # of Orders

metrics.description: Measures the total number of unique customers who placed exactly one order, highlighting single-order engagement trends.
metrics.title: # of Single Orders

metrics.description: Measures total orders per customer, providing insights for targeted marketing and improved customer engagement strategies.
metrics.title: # of Orders by Customer

metrics.description: Measures total revenue by calculating the sum of order quantities multiplied by their unit prices, aiding sales and profitability insights.
metrics.title: Order Amount

metrics.description: Measures total orders placed over time, providing insight into overall sales performance and customer demand trends.
metrics.title: Orders all time

metrics.description: An assessment reflecting customer satisfaction and quality perception of a product, influencing purchasing decisions and brand loyalty.
metrics.title: Product Rating

metrics.description: Measures the number of customers returning for repeat purchases, highlighting customer loyalty and retention effectiveness.
metrics.title: Return Customers

metrics.description: Measures the number of returning customers each month, providing insights into customer loyalty and engagement trends.
metrics.title: Return Customers Monthly

metrics.description: Analyze product returns to identify trends, improve customer satisfaction, and enhance inventory management for increased profitability.

metrics.description: % Sell Through measures the efficiency of inventory turnover, providing insights into sales performance relative to stock levels.

metrics.description: Measures the total number of unique customers, providing insights into customer base growth and engagement trends.

metrics.description: Measures the total discounts applied on processed orders, highlighting sales effectiveness and customer engagement.

metrics.description: Measures the total number of unique product listings, providing insights into inventory levels and sales performance.

metrics.description: Measures total refunds issued for returned items, offering insights into sales performance and customer satisfaction trends.
